name: Try Again! (itch)
description:
This is my submission to the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.
Try Again! is a short 6 level platformer where you get help from your past selves.

Controls: 
Move - WASD/Arrow Keys
Jump - Space
Restart level - R
Restart Game - F
Quit Game - Esc

Music and Sound Effects by Subspaceaudio

Font by KineticPlasma Fonts

GitHub
